1.title: Hay Legal Group
1.plot: A Victorian home part of the Bremond Block in downtown Austin, TX has been plagued by the paranormal. A local law firm contact Mark and Billy to investigate what was Pierre Bremond's former home to find answers as to who haunts their building. They capture some of their best evidence to date, and what they find will astound you.

2.title: Clay Pit
2.plot: For years, paranormal stories have surfaced from the staff of a reported child and woman dwelling within the historic Bertram Building. Now a popular Indian restaurant, Mark and Billy become the first investigative team to see if these claims are true.

3.title: Tremont House
3.plot: Now a luxury hotel in downtown Galveston, TX, it once acted as a makeshift morgue during The Great Storm of 1900. Guests and staff have reported unknown encounters for decades. Are the lingering spirits a result of this tragedy or are there other explanations to be uncovered?

4.title: The Ward Home
4.plot: Mark and Billy travel to the "Spur Capital of Texas" in Gatesville to investigate a home built in the late 1800's. Who keeps terrorizing the current residents? Are the original owners to blame?

5.title: Old Yoakum Hospital
5.plot: Once a thriving hospital to the city of Yoakum, it now sits abandoned for the last two decades. Stories have surfaced of a mysterious blue nun and dark shadows appearing down hallways along with children spirits running within the walls of this building. Wait until you see what energies Mark and Billy of Strange Town encounter.

2.title: Bridge to the Other Side
2.plot: The Strange Town team investigates the paranormal at the Moore's Crossing bridge in Austin, TX. Follow alongside the investigators as they get a first hand look at the strangeness that hangs-around this historical bridge.

5.title: The Lovelorn Lady
5.plot: A lost female soul searching for her lover? Orphans killed in a hurricane? Bernardo de Galvez? What exactly roams within this historical building? Follow the Strange Town team as they investigate the Hotel Galvez to find answers.

6.title: The Living Inn
6.plot:

7.title: Ghosts of Hotel Past
7.plot: Thirteen unsettled spirits are said to reside inside the Magnolia Hotel. Including those of the notorious axe murderer William Faust and the little girl he murdered- Emma Voelker. Can Strange Town find proof their lingering existence?

imdb.plot outline: While documenting their adventures, the crew of Strange Town approach each investigation as skeptics and try to find rational explanations on the strange occurrences they encounter. Even though they document situations that are unexplainable, they never try to convince the viewer that ghosts exist, but instead piece together historical facts on haunted landmarks and locations that are famous across Texas.
imdb.title: Strange Town
plot: While documenting their adventures, the crew of _Strange Town_ (qv) approach each investigation as skeptics and try to find rational explanations on the strange occurrences they encounter. Even though they document situations that are unexplainable, they never try to convince the viewer that ghosts exist, but instead piece together historical facts on haunted landmarks and locations that are famous across Texas.
